# Django Serverside Datatable[![Downloads](https://pepy.tech/badge/django-serverside-datatable)](https://pepy.tech/project/django-serverside-datatable)This is a simple package that let you use Server-side Datatable in your Django ProjectSupports datatable features such as Pagination, Search, etc...## Install```pip install django-serverside-datatable```## How to useCreate a django View that inherits from **ServerSideDatatableView**.Example (backend):```python# views.pyfrom django_serverside_datatable.views import ServerSideDatatableViewclass ItemListView(ServerSideDatatableView):queryset = models.Item.objects.all()columns = ['name', 'code', 'description']# urls.py# add the following line to urlpatternspath('data/', views.ItemListView.as_view()), ```Example (frontend):```html

Items

NameCodeDescription
```For further customization of Datatable, you may refer the Datatable official documentation.
